Usage & Getting Started

Installation

To use jockmkt-sdk, first install it using pip:

$ pip install jockmkt-sdk

Getting started:

import the package and generate a Client object instance

class jockmkt_sdk.client.Client(request_params=None)

The user should initialize an instance of this class and then call .get_auth_token(secret, api_key) to use other class methods.

Variables

ACCOUNT – The user’s account information, including their balances and the auth token they generate.

from jockmkt_sdk.client import Client

secret_key = "<secret_key: xxx>"
api_key = "<api_key: jm_api_xxx>"

# Initialize an instance of the client class:
client = Client()

# Get your authorization token
client.get_auth_token(secret_key, api_key)

You are creating an instance of the Client class and generating an auth-token, which you will use for all future api calls.

Each call is a method within the Client class.

For example:

client.get_events()

client.get_entities()

client.get_orders()
